longBusinessSummary: Persol Holdings Co.,Ltd. provides human resource services under the PERSOL brand worldwide. The company operates through five segments: Staffing, Business Process Outsourcing, Technology, Career, and Asia Pacific. It offers general worker dispatching, temporary job placement, and other services. The company also provides outsourcing services, including clerical work, government office contract, call center, helpdesk, IT and business consulting services, and health support services. In addition, it offers permanent placement mid-career and new grad recruitment; career change media and direct recruiting; outplacement support; and career self-reliance training services, as well as side job, multiple job, and freelancer support services. Further, the company provides digital solutions and system development, and engineering services; and digital solutions, such as employment, human resources management, and education, as well as incubation programs. Additionally, it offers human resource management and organizational consulting, education/training services, and home care services, as well as corporate venture capital and employment for the disabled services. The company was formerly known as Temp Holdings Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Persol Holdings Co.,Ltd. in July 2017. Persol Holdings Co.,Ltd. was incorporated in 2008 and is headquartered in Minato, Japan.
